title: Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking: Mori no Tami no Densetsu
synopsis: The story begins with a spaceship struggling to return to its home world, which crash lands onto a dying planet, triggering an explosion of pure energy, generated by the powerful and mysterious life forms that are piloting the craft. This outburst of energy infuses the dying planet with a life-generating force.
related_anime: ['Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking Super Battle Movie: Yami no Kaizou Kouchuu', 'Kouchuu Ouja Mushiking: Greatest Champion e no Michi']
